A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was not in the spirit of the true Star Wars.  It was dark and lacked any of the qualities that made the originial trilogy so great.  The depiction of Luke as an old negative has been was disheartening.  Having said all that\, there were some great lines and as a regular sci-fi action movie it was entertaining. Not really interested to see the next movie if it's in the same vein.
